title: Thanksgiving Salad Recipes That Are Bright, Bold and Easy
description: Grapefruit and herbs, apples and greens, beets and yogurt: These three pairings are designed to balance out all that holiday richness, Yewande Komolafe writes.
dc:creator: Yewande Komolafe
media:credit: Armando Rafael for The New York Times. Food Stylist: Cyd Raftus McDowell. Prop Stylist: Paige Hicks.
media:description: Citrus is the star here, with added layers of texture from coconut, peanuts and crispy shallots.
